thread.title: LINDA MOZZETTI
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by LINDA MOZZETTI

author: LINDA MOZZETTI
title: LINDA MOZZETTI
text: I got all packages in a timely manner and they were packaged so neat and I do not find that with some companies. I had to return a few things but am waiting for an exchange of one of them, a foam wedge. The wedge is very nice but I needed a smaller one and am anxious to use it.
